title: Cold End at the Edge of the Galaxy
description: Benzor is an uncomfortably cold planet in the Kor Solar System. Unfortunately the Space Pirates who stranded Major Omkar Navate of the Higher Enforcer Division in Benzor knew that. All alone in Benzor, Omkar Navate is trying to get back to Terran. But it is a losing battle with his hypothermia and other injuries. And no one knows where he is...  Why was he stranded there? More importantly can he get back home?Originally known as "Escape From Benzor." Now re-titled as "Cold End at the Edge of the Galaxy"
author: S.A. Krishnan
